entry.title: “Images”
entry.content:
Huge images should not break the layout.
Small images should just look fine :)

entry.title: Code formatting
entry.content:
This is PRE tag.
With monospace maschine-like looking.


This is text inside PRE and CODE tags at the same time.
So it is as ninja as you can get.


This is text inside PRE and CODE tags at the same time.
So it is as ninja as you can get.

This is code inside a paragraph what also can occur.

entry.title: Problem of too long lines and long titles; LongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWord like this one or even longer... man this i long... almos as long as china wall
entry.content:
Super long words should break not to mess with the layout. LongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWord 

This is PRE tag.
LongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWordLongWord


This is text inside PRE and CODE tags at the same time.
